oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pastime Inn, Nashville, Tennessee, 1940 January
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior view of the Pastime Inn, a restaurant located at 2609 West End Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, circa January 1940. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pastime Inn (Nashville, Tenn.)
